mapper.select: select * from goods order by gIDX desc limit #{startNo},#{pageSize};
select wIDX from wishlist where mMID=#{mMID} and gIDX=#{gIDX} limit 1;

select c.*, go.goNAME, g.gNAME, g.gPRICE, g.gDISCOUNT, g.gIMAGE from cart c left outer join goods g on c.gIDX = g.gIDX left outer join goods_option go on c.gIDX= g.gIDX and c.goIDX=go.goIDX where c.mMID = #{mMID};
select * from goods order by gIDX desc limit 4;
select count(*) from cart where mMID=#{mMID} and gIDX=#{gIDX} and goIDX=#{goIDX};
mapper.update: update cart set cQTY=cQTY+#{cQTY} where mMID=#{mMID} and gIDX=#{gIDX} and goIDX=#{goIDX};
